root.name: Guldkorn Expressen
root.description: OverviewGuldkorn Expressen is a Danish developed game. The game was developed for OTA as a promotional game for their breakfast cereal “Guldkorn”. It was released in 1991 for the Amiga, Commodore and PC. A Swedish version, called “Kalas Puffs Expressen”, has also been released.Just driving along collection Guldkorn. GameplayThe game consist of multiple levels. The goal of each of the levels is to collect as much “Guldkorn” as possible and drop into the large cereal box at the end of the level. You are a bear, the cereal’s mascot, and drive the train that collects the cereal. To complete you task, you are accompanied by a bee, which helps with changing the tracks and adding honey on the cereal. In the level you will encounter different types of obstacles. Fallen trees you must jump over, dirt you must clear of the tracks, rocks you must remove with dynamite and more. MultiplayerThe game can be play in a hot seat turn base mode, with up to two players
